subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Bengals linebacker Odell Thurman was reinstated from an N.F.L. suspension after sitting out the last two seasons. He was suspended the last two seasons because of violations of the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy.
snippet: Bengals linebacker Odell Thurman was reinstated from an N.F.L. suspension after sitting out the last two seasons. He was suspended the last two seasons because of violations of the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy.
